title: Clipshare

team.willo.name: Thomas Willomitzer
team.willo.about: Previously co-founder of Last.FM and former CTO of Jumio. With proven ability to shape strategy, lead large teams, drive innovation and ultimately increase market share in a highly competitive international environment.

team.matthias.name: Matthias Grieder
team.matthias.about: Matthias has a 20 years background in design and business development. He understands context by observation, listening and curiosity to find solutions and integrate the best idea. He got a proven ability to lead and manage a wide variety of design and development projects in team and independent situations.

team.markus.name: Markus Rumler
team.markus.about: Internet Entrepreneur, Co-founder and CMO at 42.cx Center of Excellence for Artificial Intelligence AG, previously founding member and CCO at Jumio.Inc and head of PR at Jajah.com. Markus brings in 20+ years of experience and is leading the marketing strategy of Snapscreen.

page.benefits.title: We enable viewers to create and share clips with a snap.
page.benefits.headline: Share and show your excitement.

page.about.title: About our vision and the company
page.about.headline: We enable a new TV or video stream experience.
page.about.copyLead: Snapscreen enables people to capture and share TV moments they love as a clip.
page.about.copy: Our solution works with live TV and streaming. Snapscreen turns the camera on a mobile device into a versatile tool to entertain, retain and engage viewers in a intuitive way.

page.notfound.title: Sorry, not found
page.notfound.description: We are great in detecting TV and streaming contents. Obviously not so in our own website contents.
